name: Family History
footer: Unless otherwise mentioned, all questions are sourced from the All of Us research study.

questionTemplates.name: oh_oh_famHx_ageAtHeartAttack
questionTemplates.title: How old was this person when the heart attack occurred?

elements.name: oh_oh_famHx_intro
elements.html:
This survey asks you about your family’s medical history. You will be shown a list of conditions and asked to select those that certain family members have or had. Understanding your family’s experiences with medical issues can tell us a lot about what kinds of medical issues might be related to your genetics. Genetics has to do with traits that are passed down from generation to generation in a family.

For these next few questions, please answer with your family members' biological sex in mind. We define an individual's biological sex as male, female, or intersex. Biological sex is often assigned at birth and associated with chromosomes and physical attributes such as anatomy. Someone who is intersex might be assigned from birth or they might not know until later in life.

elements.name: oh_oh_famHx_knowledgeIntro
elements.html:
Family Health Knowledge

Think only of people you are related to by blood including those living or deceased. Before asking a comprehensive family history, we will ask you about some of the most serious cardiac conditions that can run in families.

elements.name: oh_oh_famHx_famKnowledge
elements.title: How much do you know about illnesses or health problems of your parents, grandparents, brothers, sisters, and/or children?

elements.name: oh_oh_famHx_conditionIntro
elements.html:
Family Cardiac History

Please indicate if ANY of your parents, grandparents, brothers, sisters, and/or children have had any of the following. Think only of the people you are related to by blood. (Please select all that apply. If none of these apply, please skip.)

elements.name: oh_oh_famHx_suddenDeathUnexplained
elements.title: Sudden, unexplained death, before the age of 50. (This does not include traumatic accidents, heart attacks, or heart failure.)

elements.name: oh_oh_famHx_suddenDeathUnexplainedMotherAge
elements.title: What was your mother's age at death?

elements.title: What was your father's age at death?

elements.title: What was your sibling's age at death?

elements.title: What was your grandparent's age at death?

elements.name: oh_oh_famHx_suddenDeathUnexplainedChildAge
elements.title: What was your child's age at death?

elements.name: oh_oh_famHx_suddenDeathUnexplainedOtherAge
elements.title: What was your other relative's age at death?

elements.name: oh_oh_famHx_suddenDeathHeart
elements.title: Sudden death due to heart disease, before the age of 50. (This includes heart attack, heart failure, arrhythmia, etc.)

elements.name: motherConditionsDescription
elements.html:
Your Mother’s Health

Please indicate if your mother has ever been diagnosed with the following health conditions and/or health events. Think only of the person you are related to by blood. (please select all that apply)

choices.text: Pulmonary embolism or deep vein thrombosis
Chronic lung disease (COPD, emphysema, or bronchitis)

elements.name: oh_oh_famHx_motherMentalHealth
elements.title: Mental health or substance use conditions:

choices.text: Other arthritis, such as psoriatic arthritis and/or ankylosing spondylitis
Severe hearing loss or partial deafness in one or both ears

elements.name: siblingConditionsDescription
elements.html:
Your Sibling’s Health

Please indicate if your brothers and/or sisters [people with the same mother and/or father as you] has ever been diagnosed with the following health conditions and/or health events. Think only of those people you are related to by blood. If you have multiple siblings, please check the box if any sibling has the condition (Please select all that apply)

choices.text: I do not have any siblings.
Pulmonary embolism or deep vein thrombosis
Chronic lung disease (COPD, emphysema, or bronchitis)
